holistic_ikigai_analysis.methodology: 3-phase comprehensive analysis using full context windows
holistic_ikigai_analysis.primary_ikigai: Technology-Enhanced Active Living - Finding meaning through the intersection of technological innovation and physical wellness, particularly outdoor activities and fitness pursuits enhanced by modern tools and platforms
secondary_areas: Financial Growth & Learning - Continuous education and strategic investment in personal financial development
Premium Experience Curation - Intentional selection and enjoyment of high-quality entertainment, tools, and services

supporting_evidence.pattern: Consistent investment in outdoor equipment and technology tools
Active engagement with financial education and investment platforms
Preference for premium, research-driven choices over mass market options

framework_dimensions.external_connection: Connects through technology platforms, financial markets, and outdoor activity communities - seeks quality connections over quantity
framework_dimensions.active_engagement: Highly active - makes deliberate purchases, subscribes to educational content, engages with tools and platforms rather than passive consumption
framework_dimensions.emotional_meaning: Finds joy in the intersection of efficiency, quality, and personal improvement - values tools that enhance capabilities
framework_dimensions.voluntary_pursuit: Strong evidence of chosen interests - premium subscriptions, specific tool purchases, and educational content suggest intentional curation rather than imposed consumption
framework_dimensions.everyday_joy: Daily engagement with technology platforms (YouTube), outdoor activities enabled by quality tools, and continuous learning through financial education
framework_dimensions.growth_orientation: Clear pattern of investing in learning (financial education), capability enhancement (tools), and skill development (technology engagement)

indicators: Multiple trading newsletters (Green Star Trading, Seeking Alpha, TenViz)
Stock analysis content (dividend calendars, rating systems)

confidence_factors: High frequency of financial content engagement

recommendations: Explore communities that combine technology and outdoor pursuits - maker spaces, outdoor tech meetups, or adventure photography groups
Consider deeper engagement with financial technology - perhaps exploring fintech innovations, investment apps, or financial planning tools
Nurture the intersection of interests by seeking premium outdoor experiences enhanced by technology - GPS hiking, fitness tracking, or outdoor photography with advanced equipment
Develop expertise in areas where technology meets active living - could become a resource for others seeking quality gear recommendations or tech-enhanced fitness approaches

methodology_details.phase_1: Holistic overview analysis across all emails to extract themes and patterns
methodology_details.phase_2: Contextual per-email scoring using holistic insights
methodology_details.phase_3: Synthesis and validation for comprehensive ikigai profile
methodology_details.context_window_optimization: Adaptive batching based on model capabilities
methodology_details.inclusive_approach: Analyzes ALL email types including commercial for complete picture
